meanings.definition: Capable of being accomplished or attained.
meanings.sent1: Finishing the puzzle was achievable for the children.
meanings.sent2: Studying for the test is an achievable goal.
meanings.sent3: It was achievable for the cat to catch the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her dream of becoming a doctor seemed achievable after passing the entrance exam.
meanings.sent5: With determination, even the most challenging tasks can be achievable.

meanings.definition: Within reach; possible to do or obtain.
meanings.sent1: The cookies on the top shelf were not achievable for the toddler.
meanings.sent2: Saving money for a vacation is an achievable plan.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a penguin flying is as achievable as a fish climbing a tree.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness was just out of reach, yet still achievable.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is setting achievable goals and working towards them.
